OrganizationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

OrganizationObjectID.type: WID,  Company_Reference_ID,  Cost_Center_Reference_ID,  Custom_Organization_Reference_ID,  Organization_Reference_ID,  Region_Reference_ID
OrganizationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

OrganizationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Settlement_Run_Data.description: Organization that the settlement run is created for. Can include hierarchies.

CurrencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Settlement_Run_Data.description: Currency(s) used in the settlement run. Determines which transactions of a currency type are added to the settlement run from filters.
Use all currencies available in Workday for creating the settlement run. Workday adds transactions of all currencies available from filters.

CurrencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Settlement_Run_Data.description: Display Currency used in the settlement run.
Payment Date for the settlement run.

Settlement_Run_FilterObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Settlement_Run_FilterObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Settlement_Run_FilterObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Settlement_Run_Data.description: Custom or System Select Filters for this settlement run
Flag to include transactions for other companies in the settlement run.
Flag to include negative transactions in the settlement run. Workday leaves the settlement run in draft state before processing.

Dynamic_Supplier_Payment_DateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Dynamic_Supplier_Payment_DateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Dynamic_Supplier_Payment_DateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Settlement_Run_Data.description: Dynamic Supplier Payment Date determines payment date for Supplier Payment for Invoices.

description: Element used for creating a settlement run.

validation.validation: Cannot select more than one Currency as Multi-Currency Settlement Run has not been enabled.
Cannot select All Currencies as Multi-Currency Settlement Run has not been enabled.
No exchange rate exists to convert from the Search Currency ([restricted_currencies]) to the selected Display Currency ([display_currency]).
This company does not have an ID generator for Settlement Runs setup. The Settlement Administrator must setup a Settlement Run ID generator in order to create Settlement Runs.

This company or tenant does not have an ID generator for Outsourced Payment Group setup. The Settlement Administrator must setup a Outsourced Payment Group ID generator in order to create Settlement Runs.
An ID generator for EFT IDs has not been setup. The Settlement Administrator must setup a Payment External EFT ID generator in order to create Settlement Runs.
Cannot create settlement run as Display Currency is invalid.
It is not possible to "Include payments on behalf of other companies" for a Company Hierarchy.
It is not possible to "Include payments on behalf of other companies" for the selected Company.
Settlement Run Filters for Intercompany Items cannot be used when the Settlement Run Organization is a company hierarchy.
User is not allowed to use one or more of the selected filters.
Define bank routing rules with a default bank account using the Create Bank Routing Rules for the companies in this settlement run.
Define bank routing rules with a default bank account using the Create Bank Routing Rules for the companies in this settlement run.
